content.rendered:
Azure Management Services

ENTRUST YOUR AZURE-BASED INFRASTRUCTURE TO PROFESSIONALS.

Schedule a free consultation
Cloud Computing

Successful Cloud Solutions
Require Careful Planning

Benefit from a robust portfolio of Azure managed services.

Our team of highly skilled, certified Azure experts can help you manage and monitor your Azure cloud deployments. From cloud system pricing and design to implementation and 24x7x365 support, TechProComp helps you fully leverage all of the benefits of Microsoft Azure. Our services cover both IaaS and PaaS deployments, with strategic advisors providing unbiased guidance on the right model for your business. TechProComp offers a robust set of Azure managed services, including architecture design, migration plan creation, testing and execution, and production implementations. You can expect the same high-quality monitoring and administration services for your cloud systems as you do for your on-premises implementations.

The Scope of Our Managed

Azure Services

Azure administration

TechProComp takes care of your Azure administration tasks, such as configuring Azure resources, managing data flows going through Azure, backing up the data stored in your Azure resources.

Azure administration

TechProComp takes care of your Azure administration tasks, such as configuring Azure resources, managing data flows going through Azure, backing up the data stored in your Azure resources.

Azure monitoring 24/7

TechProComp uses such monitoring tools as Azure Monitor, Nagios, Zabbix, Prometheus, to ensure availability and reliability of your Azure-based infrastructure components. You also get reports on Azure resources utilization and performance.

Azure monitoring 24/7

TechProComp uses such monitoring tools as Azure Monitor, Nagios, Zabbix, Prometheus, to ensure availability and reliability of your Azure-based infrastructure components. You also get reports on Azure resources utilization and performance.

Azure troubleshooting

Our team addresses the issues resulting from application and server misconfigurations, server overloads, and investigates event logs to find the root causes of incidents and prevent them from reappearing.

Azure troubleshooting

Our team addresses the issues resulting from application and server misconfigurations, server overloads, and investigates event logs to find the root causes of incidents and prevent them from reappearing.

Azure usage optimization

Being a proactive MSP, TechProComp looks for the opportunities to make the use of Azure resources more efficient. E.g., we can set up autoscaling procedures to painlessly meet the changing demand in Azure storage or compute resources.

Azure usage optimization

Being a proactive MSP, TechProComp looks for the opportunities to make the use of Azure resources more efficient. E.g., we can set up autoscaling procedures to painlessly meet the changing demand in Azure storage or compute resources.

Azure cybersecurity

TechProComp comes up with an individual security strategy and best-suited security tools. We configure and manage access to Azure resources, as well as perform security monitoring, regular vulnerability scans and penetration testing across your Azure environment.

Azure cybersecurity

TechProComp comes up with an individual security strategy and best-suited security tools. We configure and manage access to Azure resources, as well as perform security monitoring, regular vulnerability scans and penetration testing across your Azure environment.

Azure compliance

We regularly check the compliance of your Azure environment with standards for secure data storage and processing, including HIPAA, GDPR, ISO 27001, PCI DSS, NIST 800. If needed, we provide our customers with a HIPAA Business Associate Agreement (BAA) and a GDPR Data Processing Agreement (GPA).

Azure compliance

We regularly check the compliance of your Azure environment with standards for secure data storage and processing, including HIPAA, GDPR, ISO 27001, PCI DSS, NIST 800. If needed, we provide our customers with a HIPAA Business Associate Agreement (BAA) and a GDPR Data Processing Agreement (GPA).

Azure migration

TechProComp plans your personalized migration and selects best-suited Azure services to establish a cost-efficient and high-performing Azure environment.

Azure migration

TechProComp plans your personalized migration and selects best-suited Azure services to establish a cost-efficient and high-performing Azure environment.

Azure help desk

TechProComp’s multi-language team is ready to provide L1-L3 support for your Azure-based infrastructure components.

Azure help desk

TechProComp’s multi-language team is ready to provide L1-L3 support for your Azure-based infrastructure components.

Azure evolution

TechProComp can plan, implement, deploy, and configure new components of your Azure-based infrastructure. We can also perform integration, maintenance and functional/technical support of the existing components.

Azure evolution

TechProComp can plan, implement, deploy, and configure new components of your Azure-based infrastructure. We can also perform integration, maintenance and functional/technical support of the existing components.

Our Microsoft Credentials

We have been recognized as a TOP IT Managed Service Provider because of our dedication to customer service, determination to find creative solutions and history of project success.

Right-Sized for Your

Operational Needs

When it comes to Azure Managed Services, one-size doesn’t fit all. We offer three service level tiers, so that you can pick a plan that is right for your business, adding ad-hoc services as you go. Every plan offers baseline access to Microsoft-certified Azure experts, 24×7 support, and powerful optimization and reporting tools.

Essentials

Our first service tier helps organizations maintain their operations baseline through basic support and event monitoring

Essentials

Our first service tier helps organizations maintain their operations baseline through basic support and event monitoring

Advanced

Our second service tier offers an enhanced level of support including incident resolution and advisory services

Advanced

Our second service tier offers an enhanced level of support including incident resolution and advisory services

Premium

Our highest tier of service provides clients with full operational support and enhancement services

Premium

Our highest tier of service provides clients with full operational support and enhancement services

WHY CHOOSE US

What You Get Entrusting Azure Management Services to Us

We define optimal Azure services for your IT infrastructure, as well as leverage Azure autoscaling features for storage and compute resources to meet the changing demand for them. We apply ITSM processes and rely on ITIL best practices to decrease Azure administration costs.

Following the established ISO 9001-certified quality management system, we make sure you derive tangible value, predictable results and transparent Azure management.

Your data stays safe in our hands – we rely on our ISO 27001-certified security management system built upon unfailing security practices and processes, modern cybersecurity technologies and security-savvy employees.

24/7 365 Service Desk supporting users around the globe.

ITIL processes adapted and automated to support DevOps and continuous integration and delivery to improve productivity, quality, and service consistency.

Proactive service monitoring means we identify and resolve issues before they impact your business and deliver a business aligned view of systems and services.

Choose the service-level agreement (SLA) and delivery model (remote, on-site, or blended) that is right for your business.

Accredited to ISO 20000 and ISO 27001 standards delivering assurance in service quality and security.

We work in collaboration with your team and suppliers to own issues and drive them to resolution.

Full-stack support for all technologies and environments – Applications, Databases, Infrastructure & Cloud Management.

With deep expertise across three Public Clouds (Oracle Cloud, Microsoft Azure & Amazon Web Services) we integrate, operate, and run modern cloud platforms side by side with legacy infrastructure and applications.

CSI is a core tenet of our Managed Services which means we are committed to an ongoing cycle of agreed improvements in operational efficiency as well as enabling your cloud strategy.

TESTIMONIAL

What our customers say

The quality of the work was outstanding, especially compared to the pricing and service we received from other firms.

Thomson Patent Law

I switched my services to Slobo and his team at Techprocomp Managed Services; Slobo had told me about the unknown and why their back up and monitoring was a no brainer for any business owner. Well, last week, my emails and folders disappeared; 4 years work at risk (and yes, I had back up). Not only did their service team respond urgently to my panic stricken call for help, within 1 day everything was restored – not sure how they did it, but that’s why you definitely need them. Until you have a crisis, you can’t tell how good a service provider is – well, 5* as far as I am concerned, thank you. Their service and skills are exceptional but what I liked was the wise advice when I first met them and it has stood my business in good stead.

James Hulk

American Postal Union

I am the office manager at Daisy Motor Group. We use TechProComp for all of our computer/technology support. Slobo is always willing to help us. As with any business, our issues always seem urgent. He works hard to get to us quickly and resolve our problems. Very trustworthy and knowledgeable. So glad we have Slobo to rely on! I would strongly recommend his services!!

Kristy Smith

Daisy Motor Group

Slobo and his team have been wonderful to work with. When the ice storm hit this February him and his team kept us up to date and kept the project rolling even through the power outages. When working with TechProComp I felt valued and taken care of the entire time. Having a running tracker of the project was really nice to have. Anytime a decision needed to be made, Slobo would present recommendations and give me a pressure free experience while also providing great advice. It is very obvious when working with them that they know what they are doing. They supported our move to a cloud based infrastructure, helping us use more modern technology that saves us money. On top of being a pleasure to work with, their prices were very fair and their estimate gave us an accurate price to keep in mind. We look forward to working with them more in the future!

Lucas Christianson

ProTex Plumbing and Mechanical

I will always highly recommend them for any IT related services, small to extremely complex. Slobo and his team will do whatever it takes (working after hours) to fulfill your needs. Our entire system was set up and monitored by them and during the process they listened to what we wanted and provided feedback explaining how they could best achieve what we wanted. Never a pushy attitude insisting we spend more money on hardware unless it was absolutely necessary. Their prices are more than fair and regardless of that, I have never encountered more timely service and availability to address our IT related needs.

Michael Nickel

Digg Commercial

TechProComp is very professional. Slobo, and his team are really knowledgeable about a wide range of issues. Slobo has really helped us out when other services have become overwhelmed due to the pandemic. Thanks so much!

Kyle McClintock

Thompson Patent Law

Called the service and he was able to come same day and save our data. Business was up and running within the hour. Great service fast and reasonable priced. Would definitely use again.

Emma Kallash

Feniex Industries

Great company for all of your IT services!!!!! Very happy customer!!!!!!

Leah Smith

Best Western Plus Hotel
